import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List resolution actions"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/resolutions/actions"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns resolution actions available to the authenticated user.

**Prerequisites**
None. This endpoint relies on the authenticated session context and optional pagination controls.

**Workflow Example**
1. List available resolution actions: [GET /api/v1.0/resolutions/actions](/docs/api/tickets/list-resolution-actions).
2. Inspect a specific action: [GET /api/v1.0/resolutions/actions/\{actionId\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-resolution-action).

**Minimal Required Fields**: None. Use optional `$p` (page index) and `$s` (page size) query parameters to paginate results.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"$p","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Zero-based page index to retrieve","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":0},"example":0},{"name":"$s","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Number of records per page","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":1},"example":20}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
